00069 /* ****************************************************** */
00070 /* Outliner Selection (grey-blue highlight for rows) */
00071 
00072 static int outliner_select(SpaceOops *soops, ListBase *lb, int *index, short *selecting)
00073 {
00074     TreeElement *te;
00075     TreeStoreElem *tselem;
00076     int change= 0;
00077     
00078     for (te= lb->first; te && *index >= 0; te=te->next, (*index)--) {
00079         tselem= TREESTORE(te);
00080         
00081         /* if we've encountered the right item, set its 'Outliner' selection status */
00082         if (*index == 0) {
00083             /* this should be the last one, so no need to do anything with index */
00084             if ((te->flag & TE_ICONROW)==0) {
00085                 /* -1 value means toggle testing for now... */
00086                 if (*selecting == -1) {
00087                     if (tselem->flag & TSE_SELECTED) 
00088                         *selecting= 0;
00089                     else 
00090                         *selecting= 1;
00091                 }
00092                 
00093                 /* set selection */
00094                 if (*selecting) 
00095                     tselem->flag |= TSE_SELECTED;
00096                 else 
00097                     tselem->flag &= ~TSE_SELECTED;
00098 
00099                 change |= 1;
00100             }
00101         }
00102         else if (TSELEM_OPEN(tselem,soops)) {
00103             /* Only try selecting sub-elements if we haven't hit the right element yet
00104              *
00105              * Hack warning:
00106              *  Index must be reduced before supplying it to the sub-tree to try to do
00107              *  selection, however, we need to increment it again for the next loop to 
00108              *  function correctly
00109              */
00110             (*index)--;
00111             change |= outliner_select(soops, &te->subtree, index, selecting);
00112             (*index)++;
00113         }
00114     }
00115 
00116     return change;
00117 }

00120 /* Outliner Element Selection/Activation on Click */
00121 
00122 static int tree_element_active_renderlayer(bContext *C, TreeElement *te, TreeStoreElem *tselem, int set)
00123 {
00124     Scene *sce;
00125     
00126     /* paranoia check */
00127     if (te->idcode!=ID_SCE)
00128         return 0;
00129     sce= (Scene *)tselem->id;
00130     
00131     if (set) {
00132         sce->r.actlay= tselem->nr;
00133         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_RENDER_OPTIONS, sce);
00134     }
00135     else {
00136         return sce->r.actlay==tselem->nr;
00137     }
00138     return 0;
00139 }
00140 
00141 static int  tree_element_set_active_object(bContext *C, Scene *scene, SpaceOops *soops, TreeElement *te, int set)
00142 {
00143     TreeStoreElem *tselem= TREESTORE(te);
00144     Scene *sce;
00145     Base *base;
00146     Object *ob= NULL;
00147     
00148     /* if id is not object, we search back */
00149     if (te->idcode==ID_OB) ob= (Object *)tselem->id;
00150     else {
00151         ob= (Object *)outliner_search_back(soops, te, ID_OB);
00152         if (ob==OBACT) return 0;
00153     }
00154     if (ob==NULL) return 0;
00155     
00156     sce= (Scene *)outliner_search_back(soops, te, ID_SCE);
00157     if (sce && scene != sce) {
00158         ED_screen_set_scene(C, CTX_wm_screen(C), sce);
00159     }
00160     
00161     /* find associated base in current scene */
00162     base= object_in_scene(ob, scene);
00163 
00164     if (base) {
00165         if (set==2) {
00166             /* swap select */
00167             if (base->flag & SELECT)
00168                 ED_base_object_select(base, BA_DESELECT);
00169             else 
00170                 ED_base_object_select(base, BA_SELECT);
00171         }
00172         else {
00173             /* deleselect all */
00174             scene_deselect_all(scene);
00175             ED_base_object_select(base, BA_SELECT);
00176         }
00177         if (C) {
00178             ED_base_object_activate(C, base); /* adds notifier */
00179             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_OB_SELECT, scene);
00180         }
00181     }
00182     
00183     if (ob!=scene->obedit)
00184         ED_object_exit_editmode(C, EM_FREEDATA|EM_FREEUNDO|EM_WAITCURSOR|EM_DO_UNDO);
00185         
00186     return 1;
00187 }
00188 
00189 static int tree_element_active_material(bContext *C, Scene *scene, SpaceOops *soops, TreeElement *te, int set)
00190 {
00191     TreeElement *tes;
00192     Object *ob;
00193     
00194     /* we search for the object parent */
00195     ob= (Object *)outliner_search_back(soops, te, ID_OB);
00196     // note: ob->matbits can be NULL when a local object points to a library mesh.
00197     if (ob==NULL || ob!=OBACT || ob->matbits==NULL) return 0;   // just paranoia
00198     
00199     /* searching in ob mat array? */
00200     tes= te->parent;
00201     if (tes->idcode==ID_OB) {
00202         if (set) {
00203             ob->actcol= te->index+1;
00204             ob->matbits[te->index]= 1;  // make ob material active too
00205         }
00206         else {
00207             if (ob->actcol == te->index+1)
00208                 if (ob->matbits[te->index]) return 1;
00209         }
00210     }
00211     /* or we search for obdata material */
00212     else {
00213         if (set) {
00214             ob->actcol= te->index+1;
00215             ob->matbits[te->index]= 0;  // make obdata material active too
00216         }
00217         else {
00218             if (ob->actcol == te->index+1)
00219                 if (ob->matbits[te->index]==0) return 1;
00220         }
00221     }
00222     if (set) {
00223         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_MATERIAL|ND_SHADING, NULL);
00224     }
00225     return 0;
00226 }

00228 static int tree_element_active_texture(bContext *C, Scene *scene, SpaceOops *soops, TreeElement *te, int set)
00229 {
00230     TreeElement *tep;
00231     TreeStoreElem /* *tselem,*/ *tselemp;
00232     Object *ob=OBACT;
00233     SpaceButs *sbuts=NULL;
00234     
00235     if (ob==NULL) return 0; // no active object
00236     
00237     /*tselem= TREESTORE(te);*/ /*UNUSED*/
00238     
00239     /* find buttons area (note, this is undefined really still, needs recode in blender) */
00240     /* XXX removed finding sbuts */
00241     
00242     /* where is texture linked to? */
00243     tep= te->parent;
00244     tselemp= TREESTORE(tep);
00245     
00246     if (tep->idcode==ID_WO) {
00247         World *wrld= (World *)tselemp->id;
00248 
00249         if (set) {
00250             if (sbuts) {
00251                 // XXX sbuts->tabo= TAB_SHADING_TEX;    // hack from header_buttonswin.c
00252                 // XXX sbuts->texfrom= 1;
00253             }
00254 // XXX          extern_set_butspace(F6KEY, 0);  // force shading buttons texture
00255             wrld->texact= te->index;
00256         }
00257         else if (tselemp->id == (ID *)(scene->world)) {
00258             if (wrld->texact==te->index) return 1;
00259         }
00260     }
00261     else if (tep->idcode==ID_LA) {
00262         Lamp *la= (Lamp *)tselemp->id;
00263         if (set) {
00264             if (sbuts) {
00265                 // XXX sbuts->tabo= TAB_SHADING_TEX;    // hack from header_buttonswin.c
00266                 // XXX sbuts->texfrom= 2;
00267             }
00268 // XXX          extern_set_butspace(F6KEY, 0);  // force shading buttons texture
00269             la->texact= te->index;
00270         }
00271         else {
00272             if (tselemp->id == ob->data) {
00273                 if (la->texact==te->index) return 1;
00274             }
00275         }
00276     }
00277     else if (tep->idcode==ID_MA) {
00278         Material *ma= (Material *)tselemp->id;
00279         if (set) {
00280             if (sbuts) {
00281                 //sbuts->tabo= TAB_SHADING_TEX; // hack from header_buttonswin.c
00282                 // XXX sbuts->texfrom= 0;
00283             }
00284 // XXX          extern_set_butspace(F6KEY, 0);  // force shading buttons texture
00285             ma->texact= (char)te->index;
00286             
00287             /* also set active material */
00288             ob->actcol= tep->index+1;
00289         }
00290         else if (tep->flag & TE_ACTIVE) {   // this is active material
00291             if (ma->texact==te->index) return 1;
00292         }
00293     }
00294     
00295     if (set)
00296         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_TEXTURE, NULL);
00297 
00298     return 0;
00299 }

00302 static int tree_element_active_lamp(bContext *UNUSED(C), Scene *scene, SpaceOops *soops, TreeElement *te, int set)
00303 {
00304     Object *ob;
00305     
00306     /* we search for the object parent */
00307     ob= (Object *)outliner_search_back(soops, te, ID_OB);
00308     if (ob==NULL || ob!=OBACT) return 0;    // just paranoia
00309     
00310     if (set) {
00311 // XXX      extern_set_butspace(F5KEY, 0);
00312     }
00313     else return 1;
00314     
00315     return 0;
00316 }

00319 {
00320     Object *ob= (Object *)outliner_search_back(soops, te, ID_OB);
00321 
00322     if (set)
00323         return 0;
00324 
00325     return scene->camera == ob;
00326 }

00328 static int tree_element_active_world(bContext *C, Scene *scene, SpaceOops *soops, TreeElement *te, int set)
00329 {
00330     TreeElement *tep;
00331     TreeStoreElem *tselem=NULL;
00332     Scene *sce=NULL;
00333     
00334     tep= te->parent;
00335     if (tep) {
00336         tselem= TREESTORE(tep);
00337         sce= (Scene *)tselem->id;
00338     }
00339     
00340     if (set) {  // make new scene active
00341         if (sce && scene != sce) {
00342             ED_screen_set_scene(C, CTX_wm_screen(C), sce);
00343         }
00344     }
00345     
00346     if (tep==NULL || tselem->id == (ID *)scene) {
00347         if (set) {
00348 // XXX          extern_set_butspace(F8KEY, 0);
00349         }
00350         else {
00351             return 1;
00352         }
00353     }
00354     return 0;
00355 }

00357 static int tree_element_active_defgroup(bContext *C, Scene *scene, TreeElement *te, TreeStoreElem *tselem, int set)
00358 {
00359     Object *ob;
00360     
00361     /* id in tselem is object */
00362     ob= (Object *)tselem->id;
00363     if (set) {
00364         BLI_assert(te->index+1 >= 0);
00365         ob->actdef= te->index+1;
00366 
00367         DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00368         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_TRANSFORM, ob);
00369     }
00370     else {
00371         if (ob==OBACT)
00372             if (ob->actdef== te->index+1) return 1;
00373     }
00374     return 0;
00375 }

00377 static int tree_element_active_posegroup(bContext *C, Scene *scene, TreeElement *te, TreeStoreElem *tselem, int set)
00378 {
00379     Object *ob= (Object *)tselem->id;
00380     
00381     if (set) {
00382         if (ob->pose) {
00383             ob->pose->active_group= te->index+1;
00384             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, ob);
00385         }
00386     }
00387     else {
00388         if (ob==OBACT && ob->pose) {
00389             if (ob->pose->active_group== te->index+1) return 1;
00390         }
00391     }
00392     return 0;
00393 }

00395 static int tree_element_active_posechannel(bContext *C, Scene *scene, TreeElement *te, TreeStoreElem *tselem, int set)
00396 {
00397     Object *ob= (Object *)tselem->id;
00398     bArmature *arm= ob->data;
00399     bPoseChannel *pchan= te->directdata;
00400     
00401     if (set) {
00402         if (!(pchan->bone->flag & BONE_HIDDEN_P)) {
00403             
00404             if (set==2) ED_pose_deselectall(ob, 2); // 2 = clear active tag
00405             else ED_pose_deselectall(ob, 0);    // 0 = deselect 
00406             
00407             if (set==2 && (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED)) {
00408                 pchan->bone->flag &= ~BONE_SELECTED;
00409             }
00410             else {
00411                 pchan->bone->flag |= BONE_SELECTED;
00412                 arm->act_bone= pchan->bone;
00413             }
00414             
00415             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_BONE_ACTIVE, ob);
00416 
00417         }
00418     }
00419     else {
00420         if (ob==OBACT && ob->pose) {
00421             if (pchan->bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED) return 1;
00422         }
00423     }
00424     return 0;
00425 }
00426 
00427 static int tree_element_active_bone(bContext *C, Scene *scene, TreeElement *te, TreeStoreElem *tselem, int set)
00428 {
00429     bArmature *arm= (bArmature *)tselem->id;
00430     Bone *bone= te->directdata;
00431     
00432     if (set) {
00433         if (!(bone->flag & BONE_HIDDEN_P)) {
00434             if (set==2) ED_pose_deselectall(OBACT, 2);  // 2 is clear active tag
00435             else ED_pose_deselectall(OBACT, 0);
00436             
00437             if (set==2 && (bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED)) {
00438                 bone->flag &= ~BONE_SELECTED;
00439             }
00440             else {
00441                 bone->flag |= BONE_SELECTED;
00442                 arm->act_bone= bone;
00443             }
00444             
00445             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_BONE_ACTIVE, OBACT);
00446         }
00447     }
00448     else {
00449         Object *ob= OBACT;
00450         
00451         if (ob && ob->data==arm) {
00452             if (bone->flag & BONE_SELECTED) return 1;
00453         }
00454     }
00455     return 0;
00456 }

00459 /* ebones only draw in editmode armature */
00460 static void tree_element_active_ebone__sel(bContext *C, Scene *scene, bArmature *arm, EditBone *ebone, short sel)
00461 {
00462     if (sel) {
00463         ebone->flag |= BONE_SELECTED|BONE_ROOTSEL|BONE_TIPSEL;
00464         arm->act_edbone= ebone;
00465         // flush to parent?
00466         if (ebone->parent && (ebone->flag & BONE_CONNECTED)) ebone->parent->flag |= BONE_TIPSEL;
00467     }
00468     else {
00469         ebone->flag &= ~(BONE_SELECTED|BONE_ROOTSEL|BONE_TIPSEL);
00470         // flush to parent?
00471         if (ebone->parent && (ebone->flag & BONE_CONNECTED)) ebone->parent->flag &= ~BONE_TIPSEL;
00472     }
00473 
00474     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_BONE_ACTIVE, scene->obedit);
00475 }
00476 static int tree_element_active_ebone(bContext *C, Scene *scene, TreeElement *te, TreeStoreElem *UNUSED(tselem), int set)
00477 {
00478     bArmature *arm= scene->obedit->data;
00479     EditBone *ebone= te->directdata;
00480 
00481     if (set==1) {
00482         if (!(ebone->flag & BONE_HIDDEN_A)) {
00483             ED_armature_deselect_all(scene->obedit, 0); // deselect
00484             tree_element_active_ebone__sel(C, scene, arm, ebone, TRUE);
00485             return 1;
00486         }
00487     }
00488     else if (set==2) {
00489         if (!(ebone->flag & BONE_HIDDEN_A)) {
00490             if (!(ebone->flag & BONE_SELECTED)) {
00491                 tree_element_active_ebone__sel(C, scene, arm, ebone, TRUE);
00492                 return 1;
00493             }
00494             else {
00495                 /* entirely selected, so de-select */
00496                 tree_element_active_ebone__sel(C, scene, arm, ebone, FALSE);
00497                 return 0;
00498             }
00499         }
00500     }
00501     else if (ebone->flag & BONE_SELECTED) {
00502         return 1;
00503     }
00504     return 0;
00505 }

00551 static int tree_element_active_pose(bContext *C, Scene *scene, TreeElement *UNUSED(te), TreeStoreElem *tselem, int set)
00552 {
00553     Object *ob= (Object *)tselem->id;
00554     Base *base= object_in_scene(ob, scene);
00555     
00556     if (set) {
00557         if (scene->obedit)
00558             ED_object_exit_editmode(C, EM_FREEDATA|EM_FREEUNDO|EM_WAITCURSOR|EM_DO_UNDO);
00559         
00560         if (ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE)
00561             ED_armature_exit_posemode(C, base);
00562         else 
00563             ED_armature_enter_posemode(C, base);
00564     }
00565     else {
00566         if (ob->mode & OB_MODE_POSE) return 1;
00567     }
00568     return 0;
00569 }

00571 static int tree_element_active_sequence(TreeElement *te, TreeStoreElem *UNUSED(tselem), int set)
00572 {
00573     Sequence *seq= (Sequence*) te->directdata;
00574 
00575     if (set) {
00576 // XXX      select_single_seq(seq, 1);
00577     }
00578     else {
00579         if (seq->flag & SELECT)
00580             return(1);
00581     }
00582     return(0);
00583 }
00584 
00585 static int tree_element_active_sequence_dup(Scene *scene, TreeElement *te, TreeStoreElem *UNUSED(tselem), int set)
00586 {
00587     Sequence *seq, *p;
00588     Editing *ed= seq_give_editing(scene, FALSE);
00589 
00590     seq= (Sequence*)te->directdata;
00591     if (set==0) {
00592         if (seq->flag & SELECT)
00593             return(1);
00594         return(0);
00595     }
00596 
00597 // XXX  select_single_seq(seq, 1);
00598     p= ed->seqbasep->first;
00599     while (p) {
00600         if ((!p->strip) || (!p->strip->stripdata) || (!p->strip->stripdata->name)) {
00601             p= p->next;
00602             continue;
00603         }
00604 
00605 //      if (!strcmp(p->strip->stripdata->name, seq->strip->stripdata->name))
00606 // XXX          select_single_seq(p, 0);
00607         p= p->next;
00608     }
00609     return(0);
00610 }
00611 
00612 static int tree_element_active_keymap_item(bContext *UNUSED(C), TreeElement *te, TreeStoreElem *UNUSED(tselem), int set)
00613 {
00614     wmKeyMapItem *kmi = te->directdata;
00615     
00616     if (set==0) {
00617         if (kmi->flag & KMI_INACTIVE) return 0;
00618         return 1;
00619     }
00620     else {
00621         kmi->flag ^= KMI_INACTIVE;
00622     }
00623     return 0;
00624 }

00626 /* ---------------------------------------------- */
00627 
00628 /* generic call for ID data check or make/check active in UI */
00629 int tree_element_active(bContext *C, Scene *scene, SpaceOops *soops, TreeElement *te, int set)
00630 {
00631 
00632     switch(te->idcode) {
00633         /* Note: no ID_OB: objects are handled specially to allow multiple
00634          * selection. See do_outliner_item_activate. */
00635         case ID_MA:
00636             return tree_element_active_material(C, scene, soops, te, set);
00637         case ID_WO:
00638             return tree_element_active_world(C, scene, soops, te, set);
00639         case ID_LA:
00640             return tree_element_active_lamp(C, scene, soops, te, set);
00641         case ID_TE:
00642             return tree_element_active_texture(C, scene, soops, te, set);
00643         case ID_TXT:
00644             return tree_element_active_text(C, scene, soops, te, set);
00645         case ID_CA:
00646             return tree_element_active_camera(C, scene, soops, te, set);
00647     }
00648     return 0;
00649 }
00650 
00651 /* generic call for non-id data to make/check active in UI */
00652 /* Context can be NULL when set==0 */
00653 int tree_element_type_active(bContext *C, Scene *scene, SpaceOops *soops, TreeElement *te, TreeStoreElem *tselem, int set)
00654 {
00655     switch(tselem->type) {
00656         case TSE_DEFGROUP:
00657             return tree_element_active_defgroup(C, scene, te, tselem, set);
00658         case TSE_BONE:
00659             return tree_element_active_bone(C, scene, te, tselem, set);
00660         case TSE_EBONE:
00661             return tree_element_active_ebone(C, scene, te, tselem, set);
00662         case TSE_MODIFIER:
00663             return tree_element_active_modifier(C, te, tselem, set);
00664         case TSE_LINKED_OB:
00665             if (set) tree_element_set_active_object(C, scene, soops, te, set);
00666             else if (tselem->id==(ID *)OBACT) return 1;
00667             break;
00668         case TSE_LINKED_PSYS:
00669             return tree_element_active_psys(C, scene, te, tselem, set);
00670         case TSE_POSE_BASE:
00671             return tree_element_active_pose(C, scene, te, tselem, set);
00672         case TSE_POSE_CHANNEL:
00673             return tree_element_active_posechannel(C, scene, te, tselem, set);
00674         case TSE_CONSTRAINT:
00675             return tree_element_active_constraint(C, te, tselem, set);
00676         case TSE_R_LAYER:
00677             return tree_element_active_renderlayer(C, te, tselem, set);
00678         case TSE_POSEGRP:
00679             return tree_element_active_posegroup(C, scene, te, tselem, set);
00680         case TSE_SEQUENCE:
00681             return tree_element_active_sequence(te, tselem, set);
00682         case TSE_SEQUENCE_DUP:
00683             return tree_element_active_sequence_dup(scene, te, tselem, set);
00684         case TSE_KEYMAP_ITEM:
00685             return tree_element_active_keymap_item(C, te, tselem, set);
00686             
00687     }
00688     return 0;
00689 }
00690 
00691 /* ================================================ */
00692 
00693 static int do_outliner_item_activate(bContext *C, Scene *scene, ARegion *ar, SpaceOops *soops, TreeElement *te, int extend, const float mval[2])
00694 {
00695     
00696     if (mval[1]>te->ys && mval[1]<te->ys+UI_UNIT_Y) {
00697         TreeStoreElem *tselem= TREESTORE(te);
00698         int openclose= 0;
00699         
00700         /* open close icon */
00701         if ((te->flag & TE_ICONROW)==0) {               // hidden icon, no open/close
00702             if ( mval[0]>te->xs && mval[0]<te->xs+UI_UNIT_X)
00703                 openclose= 1;
00704         }
00705         
00706         if (openclose) {
00707             /* all below close/open? */
00708             if (extend) {
00709                 tselem->flag &= ~TSE_CLOSED;
00710                 outliner_set_flag(soops, &te->subtree, TSE_CLOSED, !outliner_has_one_flag(soops, &te->subtree, TSE_CLOSED, 1));
00711             }
00712             else {
00713                 if (tselem->flag & TSE_CLOSED) tselem->flag &= ~TSE_CLOSED;
00714                 else tselem->flag |= TSE_CLOSED;
00715                 
00716             }
00717             
00718             return 1;
00719         }
00720         /* name and first icon */
00721         else if (mval[0]>te->xs+UI_UNIT_X && mval[0]<te->xend) {
00722             
00723             /* always makes active object */
00724             if (tselem->type!=TSE_SEQUENCE && tselem->type!=TSE_SEQ_STRIP && tselem->type!=TSE_SEQUENCE_DUP)
00725                 tree_element_set_active_object(C, scene, soops, te, 1 + (extend!=0 && tselem->type==0));
00726             
00727             if (tselem->type==0) { // the lib blocks
00728                 /* editmode? */
00729                 if (te->idcode==ID_SCE) {
00730                     if (scene!=(Scene *)tselem->id) {
00731                         ED_screen_set_scene(C, CTX_wm_screen(C), (Scene *)tselem->id);
00732                     }
00733                 }
00734                 else if (te->idcode==ID_GR) {
00735                     Group *gr= (Group *)tselem->id;
00736                     GroupObject *gob;
00737                     
00738                     if (extend) {
00739                         int sel= BA_SELECT;
00740                         for (gob= gr->gobject.first; gob; gob= gob->next) {
00741                             if (gob->ob->flag & SELECT) {
00742                                 sel= BA_DESELECT;
00743                                 break;
00744                             }
00745                         }
00746                         
00747                         for (gob= gr->gobject.first; gob; gob= gob->next) {
00748                             ED_base_object_select(object_in_scene(gob->ob, scene), sel);
00749                         }
00750                     }
00751                     else {
00752                         scene_deselect_all(scene);
00753                         
00754                         for (gob= gr->gobject.first; gob; gob= gob->next) {
00755                             if ((gob->ob->flag & SELECT) == 0)
00756                                 ED_base_object_select(object_in_scene(gob->ob, scene), BA_SELECT);
00757                         }
00758                     }
00759                     
00760                     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_OB_SELECT, scene);
00761                 }
00762                 else if (ELEM5(te->idcode, ID_ME, ID_CU, ID_MB, ID_LT, ID_AR)) {
00763                     WM_operator_name_call(C, "OBJECT_OT_editmode_toggle", WM_OP_INVOKE_REGION_WIN, NULL);
00764                 }
00765                 else {  // rest of types
00766                     tree_element_active(C, scene, soops, te, 1);
00767                 }
00768                 
00769             }
00770             else tree_element_type_active(C, scene, soops, te, tselem, 1+(extend!=0));
00771             
00772             return 1;
00773         }
00774     }
00775     
00776     for (te= te->subtree.first; te; te= te->next) {
00777         if (do_outliner_item_activate(C, scene, ar, soops, te, extend, mval)) return 1;
00778     }
00779     return 0;
00780 }
00781 
00782 /* event can enterkey, then it opens/closes */
00783 static int outliner_item_activate(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00784 {
00785     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00786     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
00787     SpaceOops *soops= CTX_wm_space_outliner(C);
00788     TreeElement *te;
00789     float fmval[2];
00790     int extend= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend");
00791 
00792     UI_view2d_region_to_view(&ar->v2d, event->mval[0], event->mval[1], fmval, fmval+1);
00793 
00794     if ( !ELEM3(soops->outlinevis, SO_DATABLOCKS, SO_USERDEF, SO_KEYMAP) &&
00795          !(soops->flag & SO_HIDE_RESTRICTCOLS) &&
00796          (fmval[0] > ar->v2d.cur.xmax - OL_TOG_RESTRICT_VIEWX))
00797     {
00798         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00799     }
00800 
00801     for (te= soops->tree.first; te; te= te->next) {
00802         if (do_outliner_item_activate(C, scene, ar, soops, te, extend, fmval)) break;
00803     }
00804     
00805     if (te) {
00806         ED_undo_push(C, "Outliner click event");
00807     }
00808     else {
00809         short selecting= -1;
00810         int row;
00811         
00812         /* get row number - 100 here is just a dummy value since we don't need the column */
00813         UI_view2d_listview_view_to_cell(&ar->v2d, 1000, UI_UNIT_Y, 0.0f, OL_Y_OFFSET, 
00814                         fmval[0], fmval[1], NULL, &row);
00815         
00816         /* select relevant row */
00817         if (outliner_select(soops, &soops->tree, &row, &selecting)) {
00818         
00819             soops->storeflag |= SO_TREESTORE_REDRAW;
00820         
00821             /* no need for undo push here, only changing outliner data which is
00822              * scene level - campbell */
00823             /* ED_undo_push(C, "Outliner selection event"); */
00824         }
00825     }
00826     
00827     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00828 
00829     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00830 }
00831 
00832 void OUTLINER_OT_item_activate(wmOperatorType *ot)
00833 {
00834     ot->name = "Activate Item";
00835     ot->idname = "OUTLINER_OT_item_activate";
00836     ot->description = "Handle mouse clicks to activate/select items";
00837     
00838     ot->invoke = outliner_item_activate;
00839     
00840     ot->poll = ED_operator_outliner_active;
00841     
00842     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "extend", 1, "Extend", "Extend selection for activation");
00843 }
00844 
00845 /* ****************************************************** */
00846 
00847 /* **************** Border Select Tool ****************** */
00848 static void outliner_item_border_select(Scene *scene, SpaceOops *soops, rctf *rectf, TreeElement *te, int gesture_mode)
00849 {
00850     TreeStoreElem *tselem= TREESTORE(te);
00851 
00852     if (te->ys <= rectf->ymax && te->ys + UI_UNIT_Y >= rectf->ymin) {
00853         if (gesture_mode == GESTURE_MODAL_SELECT) {
00854             tselem->flag |= TSE_SELECTED;
00855         }
00856         else {
00857             tselem->flag &= ~TSE_SELECTED;
00858         }
00859     }
00860 
00861     /* Look at its children. */
00862     if ((tselem->flag & TSE_CLOSED) == 0) {
00863         for (te = te->subtree.first; te; te = te->next) {
00864             outliner_item_border_select(scene, soops, rectf, te, gesture_mode);
00865         }
00866     }
00867     return;
00868 }
00869 
00870 static int outliner_border_select_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00871 {
00872     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00873     SpaceOops *soops= CTX_wm_space_outliner(C);
00874     ARegion *ar= CTX_wm_region(C);
00875     TreeElement *te;
00876     rcti rect;
00877     rctf rectf;
00878     int gesture_mode= RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "gesture_mode");
00879 
00880     rect.xmin = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "xmin");
00881     rect.ymin = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "ymin");
00882     UI_view2d_region_to_view(&ar->v2d, rect.xmin, rect.ymin, &rectf.xmin, &rectf.ymin);
00883 
00884     rect.xmax = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "xmax");
00885     rect.ymax = RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "ymax");
00886     UI_view2d_region_to_view(&ar->v2d, rect.xmax, rect.ymax, &rectf.xmax, &rectf.ymax);
00887 
00888     for (te= soops->tree.first; te; te= te->next) {
00889         outliner_item_border_select(scene, soops, &rectf, te, gesture_mode);
00890     }
00891 
00892     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_OB_SELECT, scene);
00893     ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00894 
00895     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00896 }
00897 
00898 void OUTLINER_OT_select_border(wmOperatorType *ot)
00899 {
00900     /* identifiers */
00901     ot->name = "Border Select";
00902     ot->idname = "OUTLINER_OT_select_border";
00903     ot->description = "Use box selection to select tree elements";
00904 
00905     /* api callbacks */
00906     ot->invoke = WM_border_select_invoke;
00907     ot->exec = outliner_border_select_exec;
00908     ot->modal = WM_border_select_modal;
00909     ot->cancel = WM_border_select_cancel;
00910 
00911     ot->poll = ED_operator_outliner_active;
00912 
00913     /* flags */
00914     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00915 
00916     /* rna */
00917     WM_operator_properties_gesture_border(ot, FALSE);
00918 }
